tokens.text: has a variable step height for climbing blocks

generated_doNotEdit.title: Variable Max Auto Step
generated_doNotEdit.description: Entities with this component will have a maximum auto step height that is different depending on whether they are on a block that prevents jumping. Incompatible with "runtime_identifier": "minecraft:horse".

fields.title: Base Value
fields.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block.

fields.title: Controlled Value
fields.description: The maximum auto step height when on any other block and controlled by the player.

fields.title: Jump Prevented Value
fields.description: The maximum auto step height when on a block that prevents jumping.
